Question
========

One calculates twice a 95% confidence interval for the population proportion p, once based on a sample of 50 observations (interval A) and once based on a sample of 200 observations (interval B). Compared to interval A, interval B is

Answerlist
----------

* Twice as narrow
* Four times as narrow
* Eight times as narrow

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* Twice as narrow: Correct
* Four times as narrow: Incorrect
* Eight times as narrow: Incorrect
